thread.title: Tennessee changes date for pro day
thread.title_full: Tennessee changes date for pro day

title: Tennessee changes date for pro day
text:
Tennessee changes date for pro day The Vols announced Monday that they have rescheduled their annual pro day inside the Anderson Training Center. 
Tennessee announced Monday that it has moved its annual pro day to Friday, March 31. 
The event originally was scheduled for March 29. (What's next for the Vols? Make sure you're in the loop â€” take five seconds to sign up for our FREE Vols newsletter now!) 
Tennessee's NFL draft-eligible players will work out inside the Anderson Training Center beginning at 9 a.m. Eastern time. The pro day only will be open to NFL team and league representatives and credentialed media members. 
The Vols will hold the first of their 15 spring practices on March 21 and will practice three times weekly for five consecutive weeks leading up to the spring-ending Orange and White Game on April 22. Get VIP access to GoVols247 with a FREE 7-DAY TRIAL . Author
